net.toxbank.client.resource
Class AbstractClient<T extends net.toxbank.client.resource.IToxBankResource>

java.lang.Object
  net.toxbank.client.resource.AbstractClient<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
Direct Known Subclasses:
OrganisationClient, ProjectClient, ProtocolClient, ProtocolVersionClient, UserClient
public abstract class AbstractClient<T extends net.toxbank.client.resource.IToxBankResource>
extends Object

An abstract client, implementing HTTP GET, PUT, POST and DELETE.

Author:
nina

listURI

public List<URL> listURI(URL url)
                  throws org.opentox.rest.RestException,
                         IOException
HTTP GET with "Accept:text/uri-list". If the resource is a container, will return list URIs of contained resources. Otherwise, will return the URI of the object itself (for consistency).

Parameters:
url -
Returns:
Throws:
org.opentox.rest.RestException
